level.title: Working with Directories
level.description: Learn to create, move, and explore directories

exercises.title: Create a Directory
exercises.description: Use the 'mkdir' command to create a new directory called 'projects'.
hints: This creates a new folder named 'projects'

exercises.title: Create Multiple Directories
exercises.description: Create three directories at once: documents, downloads, and backup.
hints: You can use mkdir for multiple directories

exercises.title: Remove an Empty Directory
exercises.description: Use the 'rmdir' command to remove an empty directory. First create 'temp', then remove it.

exercises.title: Navigate Through Directories
exercises.description: Change to the documents directory, verify location with pwd, then return home.
hints: Use pwd to verify your location

exercises.title: List Directory Contents with Details
exercises.description: Use 'ls -l' to list files with detailed information like permissions and file size.
hints: ls -l shows long format with details
You'll see permissions, owner, size, and date
